question: This company ties up with Meru for e-vehicle project.
explanation: Mahindra Electric and cab service Meru announced a joint electric vehicle (EV) pilot project in Hyderabad, which will be introduced soon in other cities also. A joint statement by Mahindra Electric and Meru said that under the pilot project, Meru will deploy Mahindra's eVeritos all-electric sedans. Mahindra eVerito will be available for booking in Hyderabad through Meru's mobile apps. Also, it can be boarded from the Meru Zone at Hyderabad airport. The services will be offered at the same price as provided by the Telangana government's radio taxi fares for sedans.
